verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God. Earnestly \w I|strong="H1961"\w* seek \w You|strong="H1961"\w*; \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul thirsts \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H1961"\w*. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* body yearns \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dry \w and|strong="H3063"\w* weary land \w without|strong="H1961"\w* water.

\w So|strong="H1097"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* seen \w You|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H1097"\w* sanctuary \w and|strong="H4325"\w* beheld \w Your|strong="H7836"\w* power \w and|strong="H4325"\w* glory.

\w Because|strong="H3651"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* loving devotion \w is|strong="H3651"\w* better than life, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w will|strong="H5797"\w* glorify \w You|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* bless \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* long \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*; \w in|strong="H2896"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* name \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* lift \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hands.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* soul \w is|strong="H8034"\w* satisfied \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* richest \w of|strong="H8034"\w* foods; \w with|strong="H3651"\w* joyful lips \w my|strong="H5375"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w You|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* remember \w You|strong="H3644"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* bed, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* think \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w You|strong="H3644"\w* through \w the|strong="H1984"\w* watches \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* night.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* are \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will sing \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* wings.
\w My|strong="H1961"\w* soul clings \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*; \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* right hand upholds \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* seek \w my|strong="H8551"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H1692"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* go into \w the|strong="H8551"\w* depths \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8551"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* fall \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* power \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* sword; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w for|strong="H1245"\w* foxes.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*; \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who swear \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* exult, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mouths \w of|strong="H3027"\w* liars \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* shut.
